name: UnSummoning: the Spectral Horde
description: A nefarious necromancer summoned an army of vengeful spirits to wreak havoc upon the world. Unfortunately, they only wanted to wreak havoc upon HIM! Now he must undo what he has done by drawing upon the power of magic sigils to blast the ghouls back to the netherworld.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.8GHZ Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The tile premise is very interesting and puts a cool new spin on this type of game but I feel like I've seen everything in the first 20 minutes. After that it just gets kindof boring and repetitive. It's no Nuclear Throne I'll say that much.
